name: Bar Centro – Atlantis
description: Bar Centro is Atlantis's signature atrium lounge — open 24 hours in a distinguished high-design setting with accenting foliage and an open atrium layout. Located adjacent to the Forbes Four-Star Atlantis Steakhouse, it serves as both a pre-dinner cocktail destination and a late-night lounge for the whole group. Counter seating and a large comfortable lounge area surround an extensive draft beer tap wall. The setting blends luxury aesthetics with a relaxed social atmosphere — the right place for a nightcap after golf and a good dinner.
shortDescription: Atlantis's 24-hour atrium lounge — distinctive high-design setting, draft beer, and cocktails adjacent to the Forbes Four-Star Steakhouse.

faqs.question: Is Bar Centro the same as the Atlantis Steakhouse lounge?
faqs.answer: Bar Centro is a separate, standalone 24-hour bar that is adjacent to the Atlantis Steakhouse. The Steakhouse has its own bar area; Bar Centro serves as the resort's main atrium lounge and is open around the clock.

faqs.question: What is the atmosphere like at Bar Centro?
faqs.answer: Distinguished and high-design — an open atrium setting with accent foliage creates a sophisticated but relaxed environment. It's the kind of place a golf group naturally gravitates to for the post-round debrief.

testimonials.quote: The bar is also great — the bartenders know how to make a mean martini. Generous pours and a pleasant atmosphere throughout the resort.
testimonials.author: TripAdvisor Traveler
